author: Fox News
title: 'US will need to get involved' if Russia invades NATO countries, top House Republican warns
description: Top House Intel Committee Republican warned of U.S. involvement if Russian President Vladimir Putin attacks NATO members.
content: The top Republican on the House Intelligence Committee said Russia's siege on Ukraine is a threat to the U.S. and told Fox News that America would need to get involved if nearby NATO members were attâ€¦ [+3603 chars]
